title: 96/111/EC: Commission Decision of 22 January 1996 amending Decision 95/383/EC on the Community' s financial contribution to a programme for the control of organisms harmful to plants and plant products in Madeira for 1995 (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 January 1996 amending Decision 95/383/EC on the Community's financial contribution to a programme for the control of organisms harmful to plants and plant products in Madeira for 1995 (Only the Portuguese text is authentic) (96/111/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 95/383/EC is hereby amended as follows:
1. In the final sentence of Article 5, '31 December 1995` is replaced by '31 March 1996`.
2. In the first sentence of the second subparagraph of Annex II (I) (B) (II) (4), '31 March 1996` is replaced by '30 April 1996`.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 January 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 260, 31. 10. 1995, p. 10.
(3) OJ No L 231, 28. 9. 1995, p. 43.
